name: @tuprolog/parser-utils
description: Parsing utilis for Prolog in JS environments

scripts.transpile-sources: npx babel src -d src && npx babel index.js -d . && npx babel test -d test
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-grammar && npm run transpile-sources
scripts.test: node test/TestImport.js && node test/TestLexer.js && node test/TestParser.js

author: tuProlog
